title: Disbanding of DACOWITS (Defense Advisory Committee on Women in the Services)
mechanism: Executive decision to terminate an advisory body that shaped policies and memory regarding women in the military — cited as ‘divisive feminist agenda’
impact: Loss of continuity, suppression of institutional advisory voice on women’s service, erasure of future recommendations and historical insight
sources: Reuters: Pentagon disbands panel on military women (23 Sept 2025)
The Guardian: Hegseth dissolves women’s military committee (Sept 2025)
Military Times: Hegseth terminates women’s advisory group (Sept 2025)
